attributes.action: change the national anthem from God Save the Queen to I've got a brand new combine harvester by the Wurzels
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a petition to replace the boring national anthem of god save the queen with the inspiring "I've got a brand new combine harvester" by the Wurzels. This is the only song that can unite people in Britain during these testing times of economic hardship.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
